WorkItem.Description:
I am just starting with Graph# and if I'm going through with it, I'll be needing to extend QuickGraph as well.
So the first thing I tried is to switch to the current QuickGraph version (36564, using 3.0).

It turns out the Graph# example application requires a tiny change: removing an argument in a method call.
After that it will compile and run just fine.

I haven't done any other testing, and the updated QuickGraph.dll isn't included.
This is just for your information.

Comments.Message: Update for the newest Quickgraph version.
